description: "Worrying" coronavirus increases in the southern French city and in Bordeaux spark new restrictions.
title: Coronavirus: Marseille's Covid-19 hospital beds 'close to saturation'
title_page: Coronavirus: Marseille's Covid-19 hospital beds 'close to saturation' - BBC News
maintext: The figures for Sunday and Monday were lower - as tends to be the case for weekend reporting - but the seven-day rolling average, which smoothes out these irregularities, recorded an increase in infections for the 28th day in a row.
